dct_title_s: Map of Lower Oregon and Upper California from the latest and most authentic surveys
dct_description_sm: lith. by Alex: Zakreski Cor. Washington & Monty.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, cities and towns, mines, routes and trails, and "unexpolored" areas.
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the Year 1853, by Thomas Tennent in the Clerk's office of the District Court of the Unites States for the Northern District of the State of California."
Reproduced in: Wheat, C.I. Maps Calif. gold region, facing p. 110.
dct_publisher_sm: Thomas Tennent, at the Surveying & Navigation Warehouse Sign of the "Wooden Sailor,"
